participant_1.background:
My worst fear is losing my ability to write.
i work full time in an office , so i don t have much time to practice.
I like to spend rainy days in my studio, practicing my dance moves.
I spend time tending to my flower beds to keep my mind clear and at peace.
i have one child.

participant_2.background:
After work, I like to play guitar and practice my music with my picks and strings.
I spend my day making pottery and hiding my true self from my parents.
i have 10 years experience in our industry , yet she gets promoted.
I'm comfortable with my own company and don't need music to keep me entertained.
I play soccer on the weekends to keep myself active and to have some fun.

content.text: Hi there! How is your day going?
It is going well! I just got home from work and I am practicing my guitar.
What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play all sorts of music but mostly rock and roll.
Nice! I like to play guitar too but I do not have much time to practice. I work full time and I have one child.
I know what you mean, I work full time too and I have to practice in my spare time.
What do you like to do to relax?
I like to spend time in my garden, it is very peaceful and relaxing.
That sounds nice, I like to spend time in my garden too. It is a great place to clear my head.
I like to tend to my flower beds, it is a lot of work but it is worth it when you see the beautiful flowers.
I agree, flowers are beautiful. I also like to plant vegetables and herbs in my garden.
That is cool! I have never tried to grow vegetables in my garden.
It is not too hard, you just have to plant them at the right time and give them the right amount of water.
I might have to try that next year. I am a little busy this year with work and everything.
I understand, I am also busy this year. But I am sure you will have time to garden next year.
I hope so! I love gardening.
Me too! It is a great way to relax and clear your head.
